text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Keep that music goin! Let's get it～～! ?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Come now, let's go.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Eh, uh, Zephyr……?!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
One, two, three, four—! 
——yo, Zephachi, Tanmira!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: May we dance with you?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Sounds good! You too Bamcham! ! 
Let's all dance～! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Woah! ? Seriously! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wo～～, yay～～!! Let's go!! Spring is the beginning ♪ 
Dango is delicious! Dash down the sakura tree-lined road!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah……umm, Ruby?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——yes. …………your hand.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Take it away～Bamcham! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I kept on running, and then I saw! My future self's big ol' smile!!

text_block_list.name: Helios and Bamboo
text_block_list.text:
Is the forecast in the future rainy or sunshine? But I'm definitely 
hoping ♪ for some clear skies ♪ Jump into that blue sky!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Ahaha, amazing. 
Everyone seems to be having so much fun…….

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(——It's fun, for me too…… Helios, Bamboo, Zephyr…… 
dancing with all these kind people…… I'm happy.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——……Miracle-san?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——! Ah……Ruby……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(……It's soft. My hands are warm…… 
and pleasant. ————I see. Huh, maybe I……)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……hehe. This is fun, Ruby.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ………………I'm so glad.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Alrightー! Let's keep this party goin till morning, Fu～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Not until morningーーーー! !
The special night ends———the next day.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: To Me and My Lady, grats on best daaaaate～～～～！！

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes. Thank you for your help.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Heehee, that was mad fun! ! You had fun too Princess? 
So basically we're the strongest pair! ? BEST COUPLE! ?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Your energy captivated the audience. I believe that 
is what led to us being chosen as the "best date."

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Daitaku Helios-san. ——You have my heartfelt gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: …………a………cu—cuuuu……te………

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
…………Uhm, Helios-san. 
Are you feeling unwell?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Nope…… nuhuh……!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ……………My lady, I wuv u…….

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ————My lady! ! Wanna go on another date tonight! ? ! ?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I'm very sorry. But I have plans tonight, 
so I must decline your invitation.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Huhーー!?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Now then, I'm in a bit of a hurry. 
So please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wait, My Ladyーーーー! ! 
Even if it hurts, love you～～～～～～～! ! ! !
